# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are
currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of our software seriously. If you believe you have found a security vulnerability in the Essential Workspace (essential_dart or essential_flutter), please report it to us as described below.

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

### Reporting Process

1.  Please email us at [security@example.com](mailto:security@example.com) (Replace with actual email if available, or instruct to use private vulnerability reporting if enabled on GitHub).
2.  In your report, please include:
    *   The specific package affected (essential_dart or essential_flutter).
    *   A description of the vulnerability.
    *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
    *   Any relevant code snippets or logs.

### Response Timeline

We will acknowledge receipt of your report within 48 hours and will provide a timeline for addressing the vulnerability. We will keep you informed of our progress.

### Disclosure Policy

We ask that you do not disclose the vulnerability to the public until we have had a chance to address it and release a fix.
